title: cant add people to my ranked team
body: For some reason I havent been able to add people to my ranked team, even tho we still have room left. I have tried making my friend the leader but he couldnt invite either.

replies.body:
There are requirements players must meet before being able to be invited to a ranked team. First, they must be level 30. Second, they must have been your friend for a certain amount of time. Thirdly, they must not already be in four (or something) teams of their own beforehand.

[Here's the page on it.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752914-Getting-Started-with-Ranked-Teams) My memory isn't too great and I haven't bothered to read up on it recently because I'm not really that into ranked teams, so forgive me if what I've said isn't true. It's what it was when I did check though, kinda!
thanks for trying to help, but yesterday i could add people, but today i cant. We are all lvl 30 and have been "online" friends for ages. They also arent in 4 teams

Did this team exist before the seasonal reset? If so, you might want to just disband that team and try creating a new one.

Are you able to invite people to your normal games without aberrations?
